price: ¿Acaso tienen ídolos [que se lo garantizan]? ¡Traigan a sus ídolos, si es verdad lo que dicen!
arabic: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ شُرَكَآءُ فَلۡيَأۡتُواْ بِشُرَكَآئِهِمۡ إِن كَانُواْ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: am lahum shurakāu falyatū bishurakāihim in kānū ṣādiqīna
